document.full_text: lingering doubts over chrysler group llc's financial outlook along with the wider availability of bank debt could make it more costly for the u.s. automaker to refinance more than $7 billion government debt from its 2009 bailout.
document.title: chrysler may up bond offering as loan demand falls
lines_and_colors: lingering doubts over chrysler group llc's financial outlook along with the wider availability of bank debt could make it more costly for the u.s. automaker to refinance more than $7 billion government debt from its 2009 bailout.
